summary: Seasoned executive and educator with extensive leadership in arts education, non-profit management, and youth development. Experienced in directing programs, managing staff, and building community partnerships.

experience.title: Instructor
experience.description: Taught at Head-Royce School, contributing to Fine Arts Department (visual, music, drama, and dance).

experience.title: Chairman, Fine Arts Department
experience.description: Led the Fine Arts Department with 11 members across visual, music, drama and dance.

experience.title: Director, Summer Program
experience.company: Head-Royce School (in partnership with Oakland Unified School District)
experience.description: Directed summer program for disadvantaged middle school students; six-week session with full scholarship; mentorship throughout the year.

experience.title: Project Coordinator
experience.description: Renovation project coordination; collaboration with East Bay Community Fund, Rebuilding Together Oakland, Temple Sinai, Pulte Construction, Head-Royce School; oversaw ~50 children daily for tutoring and non-violence training.

education.degree: B.A. in Communications and Public Policy
